author: cmpilato
msg: (prop_path_internal): Do the Right Thing when svn_path_split leaves
an empty dirname.  This was causing an entry with a name of "." to
appear in the entries files...makes for some rather time-consuming
(svn_wc_set_revision): Do the Right Thing when svn_path_split leaves

author: gstein
msg: Get svn_error.c working with the latest APR pool changes (struct apr_pool_t

author: sussman
msg: Remove svn_output.py and svn_tree.py;  consolidate them all into
svn_tree.py.  Things are cleaner and simpler this way, and more

author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_path_is_thisdir): New function to check path for '.' and './'
(svn_path_is_empty): Changed to use new function svn_path_is_thisdir.

author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_wc_delete): Bug fix: if dirname after an svn_path_split is
empty, at least make it '.' so APR functions don't choke on it.
